channel.title: Jim Flaherty
channel.description: Recent news about Jim Flaherty, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Oshawa Express
item.description:
Flaherty to run in next election
Whitby-Oshawa MP and Finance Minister Jim Flaherty, seen here talking with seniors at a forum, was recently reappointed as finance minister and says he will run again in the next election. By Geoff Zochodne/The Oshawa Express. Canada will have the ...

item.title: Mentioned by durhamregion.com
item.description:
Jim Flaherty stays put as finance minister
WHITBY -- Whitby-Oshawa MP Jim Flaherty plans to forge ahead with his commitment to fiscal responsibility after keeping his post as federal finance minister. Prime Minister Stephen Harper's cabinet shuffle on Monday brings lots of new faces to the table but ...

item.title: Mentioned by Bayshore Broadcasting News Centre
item.description:

item.title: Mentioned by durhamregion.com
item.description:
Two Durham MPs named to federal cabinet
DURHAM -- Ajax-Pickering MP Chris Alexander has been promoted to the federal cabinet, while Whitby-Oshawa MP Jim Flaherty remains the finance minister. Prime Minister Stephen Harper shuffled his cabinet Monday morning, making changes at several ...

item.title: Mentioned by Windsor Star
item.description:
Jim Flaherty: Will he stay or will he go?
OTTAWA — A steady hand for the ruling Conservatives and the only finance minister they've known, Jim Flaherty will play an important role in an upcoming cabinet shuffle and future of the Harper government. Prime Minister Stephen Harper will use the ...
